value.title: Manage hybrid infrastructure with Azure Arc
value.excerpt: Learn how to work with Azure Arc enabled servers and describe Azure Arc enabled Kubernetes.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Arc
topItems.excerpt: Introduction to Azure Arc

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Arc enabled servers
topItems.excerpt: This module introduces you to Azure Arc enabled servers and describes its characteristics, capabilities, and use cases.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Arc enabled Kubernetes
topItems.excerpt: Introduction to Azure Arc enabled Kubernetes

value.title: Migrate an ASP.NET web application to Azure with Visual Studio
value.excerpt: Migrate an ASP.NET web application to Azure with Visual Studio

topItems.title: Externalize the configuration of an ASP.NET app by using an Azure key vault
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use ConfigurationBuilder to dynamically configure an ASP.NET web app to retrieve secrets from an Azure key vault.

topItems.title: Implement logging in a .NET Framework ASP.NET web application
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to implement logging in an ASP.NET web application so you can store log data in Azure Blob storage and incorporate log information into Azure Application Insights performance data.

topItems.title: Improve session scalability in a .NET Framework ASP.NET web application by using Azure Cache for Redis
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Cache for Redis to store session data and improve the scalability of web applications.

value.title: Migrating Cassandra and MongoDB workloads to Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: The focus of this learning path is to migrate MongoDB and Cassandra databases to Azure Cosmos DB.

topItems.title: Introduction to open source database migration to Azure Cosmos DB
topItems.excerpt: An introduction to migrating an open-source database to Azure Cosmos DB

topItems.title: Migrate Cassandra workloads to Cosmos DB
topItems.excerpt: Migrate Cassandra workloads to Cosmos DB

topItems.title: Migrate on-premises MongoDB databases to Cosmos DB
topItems.excerpt: Migrate MongoDB workloads to Cosmos DB

value.title: Planning Azure for SAP workloads
value.excerpt: As an IT Professional experienced in SAP solutions, you need to learn about how to leverage Azure resources that include virtual machines, virtual networks, storage accounts, and Azure AD. These modules will give you the Azure knowledge around the reference architecture for SAP Workloads, how to plan for the implementation of SAP solutions on Azure, and the preparation for your migration of SAP workloads to Azure.

topItems.title: Utilize Azure for SAP workloads reference architecture
topItems.excerpt: Utilize Azure for SAP Workloads Reference Architecture

topItems.title: Planning for implementing SAP solutions on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Planning for implementing SAP solutions on Azure

topItems.title: Prepare to migrate SAP workloads to Azure
topItems.excerpt: This module provides details on the important steps prior to deploying SAP workloads to Azure: project preparation and planning, pilot, non-production, production preparation, go live, and post production.

value.title: Protect public sector data in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn to design conceptual architecture for data classifications using data residency for Microsoft 365 and Dynamics 365 services while utilizing Azure regions and Customer lockbox. Manage breach notifications in Service Trust Portal and Azure Security Center. And encrypt data throughout its lifecycle.

topItems.title: Design cloud solutions for the public sector
topItems.excerpt: Introduction to the stakes and options for implementing Azure to safeguard public sector data.

topItems.title: Encrypt public sector data in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Overview of the options available for managing encryption keys and encrypting data throughout its lifecycle, with special attention to public sector.

value.title: Provision and manage Azure Cognitive Services
value.excerpt: Learn about Cognitive Services and the important role they play in developing AI infused applications.  This learning path will introduce you to creating, managing, and deploying Cognitive Services in the Azure portal or through containers.

topItems.title: Create and manage Cognitive Services
topItems.excerpt: Azure Cognitive Services enable developers to easily add cognitive features into their applications. Learn how to configure and manage these services for your AI application needs.

topItems.title: Investigate container for use with Cognitive Services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Container support in Cognitive Services allowing the use of APIs available in Azure and enable flexibility in where to deploy and host the services with Docker containers.

topItems.title: Secure Cognitive Services
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to secure Cognitive Services to prevent data loss and privacy violations for user data that may be a part of the solution.

value.title: Safeguard cloud resources
value.excerpt: The third and final learning path in a course on Cloud Administration from Carnegie Mellon University. Learn to monitor your cloud resources, keep them safe, and protect or recover them in the case of a disaster.

topItems.title: Monitor cloud resources
topItems.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Monitoring how your cloud resources are performing is crucial to building reliable cloud applications. This module covers what monitoring is, why you need to do it, and how you can about monitoring your resources.

topItems.title: Cloud security
topItems.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Keeping your cloud secure means more than just adding permissions to resources. Learn about what cloud security means, including threats, cryptography, and regulation.

topItems.title: Disaster recovery and backup
topItems.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. What do you do when something goes wrong with your resources on the cloud? How do you prepare for such an issue? Learn about disaster backup and recovery with this module.

value.title: Scale AI in your organization
value.excerpt: Learn to manage AI organization to create business value in manufacturing, healthcare, financial services, retail, education, and Government.

topItems.title: Implement AI in your organization
topItems.excerpt: Learn enterprise AI management with our free open online course, including machine learning.

topItems.title: Start the machine learning lifecycle with MLOps
topItems.excerpt: Learn enterprise AI management with our free open online course, including machine learning.

value.title: Transform your business applications with fusion development
value.excerpt: Fusion development allows your business to build better applications, faster by bringing together professional developers with citizen, or low-code, developers. This learning path will teach you how a fusion development team functions, introduce low-code concepts for professional developers, and explain how a professional developer can enable their citizen developer counterparts to build amazing Power Apps applications using pro-code tools and frameworks they're already familiar and comfortable with, like JavaScript, ASP.NET Core web APIs, and Azure API Management.

topItems.title: Integrate OpenAPI-enabled Web APIs with Azure API Management through Visual Studio
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to add an OpenAPI-enabled Web API application to Azure API Management through Visual Studio.

value.title: Accelerate your migration journey to Azure
value.excerpt: There are many reasons for moving to Azure and a proven, methodical approach can help you navigate that journey successfully. Microsoft provides a guidance, tools and programs you can use to ensure success.

value.title: Accelerate and scale a Spring Boot application with Azure Cache for Redis
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn what Azure Cache for Redis is, and how to use it with a Java and Spring Boot application. You'll use it to cache some business data using Spring Data Redis, and also to store HTTP session data using Spring Session.

value.title: Accelerate high performance computing storage with Azure HPC Cache
value.excerpt: Accelerate NFS storage for HPC workloads using Azure HPC Cache.

value.title: Access Metrics from your Azure Blob Storage Containers Programmatically
value.excerpt: Discover how to use Azure Monitor to gather performance metrics and then configure and access those metrics from .NET application code.

value.title: Insert and query data in your Azure Cosmos DB database
value.excerpt: Discover the Azure Cosmos DB Data Explorer tool that enables you to add or modify data. Create stored procedures in JavaScript.

value.title: Add a custom domain in Microsoft 365
value.excerpt: Add a custom domain in Microsoft 365

value.title: Work with the Django admin site
value.excerpt: Learn how to set up the built-in Django admin site and configure users for the site.

value.title: Administer and manage Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machine remotely
value.excerpt: Youll be able to select and use suitable tools and techniques to remotely manage Windows IaaS VMs, and restrict administrative connections to those VMs.

value.title: Advance Power BI Premium for the enterprise analytics market and beyond
value.excerpt: Advance Power BI Premium for the enterprise analytics market and beyond

value.title: Optimize your database by using advanced modeling patterns for Azure Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: Learn about different strategies to manage relationships between data entities when modeling a database for Azure Cosmos DB.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in financial services
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, use cases, and special factors of an AI strategy in financial services that creates business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create value in government
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, special factors, and use cases of an AI strategy in Government that creates value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in manufacturing
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, special factors, and use cases of an AI strategy in manufacturing that creates business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in retail
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, special factors, and use cases of an AI strategy in retail that creates business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Scale container applications in Azure Kubernetes Services (AKS) using KEDA
value.excerpt: Explore what your options are for autoscaling Kubernetes resources, earning when to use each and the know-how to implement KEDA

value.title: Application scalability on AKS with HorizontalPodAutoscalers
value.excerpt: Explore how to scale your deployed applications with HorizontalPodAutoscalers in AKS.

value.title: Cluster autoscaling with AKS
value.excerpt: Learn how to scale your AKS cluster automatically using the cluster autoscaler

value.title: Deploy a containerized application on Azure Kubernetes Service
value.excerpt: Explore how to create and deploy a containerized application by using Azure Kubernetes Service declarative manifest files.

value.title: Configure an Azure Kubernetes Service deployment pipeline using GitHub Actions
value.excerpt: Explore how to create an automated deployment pipeline by using GitHub Actions along with Azure Kubernetes Service.
